comments.body:
Is this an intended implementation approximation for now? It won't pass this test:
```scala
assert(classOf[Array[String]].getComponentType() == classOf[String])
```
It is indeed an approximation for the time being. The goal here was to unblock reverse. There is a separate ticket for precise semantics.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +25,29 @@    else if (ty == typeof[FloatArray]) classOf[scala.Float]
    else if (ty == typeof[DoubleArray]) classOf[scala.Double]
    else classOf[java.lang.Object]
  }
